name: test_e2e_with_logs[503_WAF_CONCAT_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `WAF_CONCAT_002` |
| **Name** | String concatenation bypass (CONCAT function) |
| **Category** | WAF_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | concatenation |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `CONCAT('sel','ect')`
